description:
Hiroya strives for the top ranking in the card game Sea Monster Cards, but he`s not faring well without any strong rare cards. Then he meets KnightChessmon, a Digimon who promises to grant his wish. Later, Tagiru and his friends hear rumors of kids being dragged to another world where their rare cards are stolen. Suspecting a Digimon`s involvement, they head to a card game tournament to find the truth...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rare Card ga Kieta! Muteki no RookChessmon
The Rare Cards Have Disappeared! The Invincible RookChessmon
レアカードが消えた! 無敵のルークチェスモン
